name: cbvabvOLD
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ cbvabv as of 9-May-2023. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
